content.detailedDescription: On 7-28-2009 at around 9:25 pm i went outside because i thought the space shuttle was supposed to be making re-entry at around 9:30. i later found it i had the date wrong. anyway thinking this my wife and i were in the back yard watching the sky and waiting to watch the shuttle come home. where we live in anahuac texas there is a george bush in bound flight path that comes right over our home as these planes make there decent for houston. therfore we are used to watching and observing all kinds of air traffic and this night was no differnt with inbound flights arriving while we were waiting on the shuttle. at around 9:35 i noticed a bright light to my north and it appeared to be moving. i pointed this out to my wife and she noticed it also. the light was bright and was moving in a south south east direction at a high rate of speed. i then noticed another light just like it maybe 10 miles behind the first one moving in the same direction. neither light was flashing and both were moving right through the flight path i mentioned. if i had to guess a altitude i would say around 20,000 feet. both lights were gone from view in about 10 to 15 seconds. about one minute later i observed another one further to the west but at much higher altitude and moving the same direction. the first two light looked low enough that i should have heard the engines if they were military or commercial flights but i heard nothing and observed no flashing lights. all three light where white.
content.summary: 3 small bright non-flashing lights moving south south east at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: It was the last week in july or the first week of august in 1981. i was only 12 years old. i have only told about three people of me and my friend���s experience. we lived in rural benton county. i was spending the night at this friends house. we were going to camp out in a ravine in the pasture behind his house. we went out at around 6:00 pm and had just started a small fire. as we were putting wood on the fire i noticed a big black object in the sky to the west of us . it was heading in a southward direction. we were trying to figure out what kind of plane it could be. when it changed direction and was headed right toward us. being kids as we were we started thinking it was the dnr coming to get us for our fire. (quite a silly thought now that i am older). we were trying to put out our fire as it approached we realized this was no plane it was black as night, triangle shaped, with three lights underneath one in each corner they were like spot lights very bright bluish white light, and one white light right in the middle. there was no sound coming from this object. and it was moving very slowly between 10 and 15 mph . my friend and i ran up under the tree on the hill. this thing was about half the size of a football field. the leaves on the trees were moving a lot but i can not remember if i could feel a wind or not. i could see the lights coming through the trees. the very next thing either of us remembered was running up the hill until we reached the fence, we were scared and nervous. we  watched this object flying of in a south east direction toward cedar rapids, and palo. we raced to his house and when we entered the clock  said 12:07 am. now mind you the place we were going to camp that night is only about  a five minute walk to the house and with in sight of the house. i can not say what happened  in the time between about 6:25 pm and 12:07 am. i  can go with out thinking of this all year but even now 28 years later this occupies my mind in the last week of july and the first week of august. and here it is i am writing this on july 29th . i have always been curious if anyone else had seen what we did. even living out in the country someone had to have seen this thing. a farmer in the fields or someone!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was black as night, triangle shaped, with three lights underneath one in each corner they were like spot lights very bright bluish white light, and one white light right in the middle. there was no sound coming from this object

content.detailedDescription:
a triangle shaped light in the sky appeared in front of the little dipper and moved west of that position and hoovered for about an hour. i went inside for a few minutes and returned to find it was gone.
   on photos it was the only light appearing in the sky in the photo. as a photo appears to be multicolor light, but round and blurry.
content.summary: Triangle shape light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in the backyard talking.I happened to look toward the north and noticed what appeared to be a very bright starlike object.I pointed it out to my wife.I happened to have my canon s5 camera with me and snapped a few shots of the object.Through the cameras viewfinder when zoomed in the object appeared to be a triangle shape with three points of light one in front and two in back.But the pictures show a totally differnt object.I will send the pics so you can analyze.You will have to zoom on them to see the object
content.summary: Starlike object

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the back deck of our house smoking when i saw a set of 4 blinking red lights in a kind of rectangular shape pass over the house. they were moving from the west to the east, low and no sound was heard. the lights blinked intermittently but stayed in the same position in relation to each other. i went to the front of the house which faces north to see the object move away to the north-east.

this is being entered on cms by steve purcell as told to me by the witness.
content.summary: Passed over my house, very low, no sound, 4 blinking red lights in a kind of rectangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was in a store shopping and i waited outside sitting on a bench. i had my camera with me as i usually do and decided to take some random pictures of the sky hoping for something to show up. i was holding the camera on my knee pointing directly overhead and above me and took several photos straight up. 

i did not know this object was above me and did not see it. 

later while viewing these photos i found this round looking what i call a orb or sphere in one picture. 

my camera of choice is a nikon s630 and all setting were set to automatic.
content.summary: Taking random pictures of the sky and upon viewing this orb shows in one picture

content.detailedDescription:
After speaking with you, yesterday i went to look at my camera and was checking the settings ! i noticed the time is 1 hour 10 min off! i started reviewing my pics again and "found another pic of the ufo" ..
this to me confirms what i originally thought and that its not a reflection/refraction of the camera. 
( i know the camera times can be quirky but this camera is new and i have never not had fresh batteries in it!! 
thanks for your time and consideration....

sincerely ,, mark
content.summary: Follow-up # 3

content.detailedDescription:
It began when i was having trouble sleeping. i had recently moved here from my native uk and my internal clock was all messed up. i was watching a movie and around 2 45 am i decided to head out onto my front porch and have a cigerette. i was walking up and down the path star gazing as i often do at night. i was about to say that suddenly i saw something but there was nothing sudden about anything that night. i looked across the street and in the distance beyond my neighbours house i saw and airplane. no big deal, they pass over frequently. i paid it no more heed.

it was a nice pleasent night and decided to have another cigerette. as i lit it i noticed that the aircraft was still coming towards me. i realised that this was odd as it would mean the aircraft was traveling incredibly slowly. i began to study it and becam aware that it had three green lights. i double checked this as i knew that was not nomal aircraft configeration. i continued to watch this crafts progretion towards me and it took almost ten minites to reach me as it made it's slow progression.

as it reached my neighbours house across the street i could make out more detail, or to be more specific, the lack of it. it seemed to be a great triangular, featureless slab drifting across the sky. it went on to pass over me and it was only then i realised that it was completly silent. not only that but everything had gone silent. the crickets had even stopped making a noise. i followed it to my my back yard and continued to watch as it headed away then in the distance it stoped and turned on a dime 45 degrees and headed out towards joliet. i continued to watch until it was obscured by trees.

at this point i sat down lit another cigerette and methodically tried to rationalise what i had seen. it could not be some alien craft because that was all bunk. it must have been an aircraft, it simply could not be anything else. it took me an hour to convince myself and i finally went to bed. next day i had no recollection of the event.

about a year later i was watching a program on ufos when suddenly an artists impression of the same thing i saw. it was only then i recalled the incident. 

i am not a credible witness. i am the epitomy of the sci fi nerd. however i am a sceptic if there are two theories 1 earthly and 1 other worldly i would accept earthly more readily.

i would very much like to hear from anyone else who saw this. the dates are very approximate...It could have been as early as june or as late as august.

i finally decided to submit this to mufon because i do not beleive i was the only person to see this...Sure it was 3 am but it was there for so long and someone somewhere must have seen it too.

i agree for my information to be passed onto third parties only for investigative purposes. not to comercial mailers and advertisers.
content.summary: Slow moving pass over my home and 45 stationary turn

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with my parents out of a restaurant on a summer night.  a couple probably also from the restaurant were looking up. i saw a disc shaped saucer with a brightly lit room above the gray body part of the ship.
 with a closer look i saw a human looking man who seemed to be moving about with other aliens not human inside. there was no sound. after about 5 minutes, it made and s-shaped exit and just disappeared with no sound.
  i pinched myself and spoke to the others during all of this to make sure it was no hallucination.
content.summary: Gray in color, lights underneath, oval disc shaped, lighted room with occupants.

content.detailedDescription:
The following took place in the city of stavanger, located on the southwestern tip of norway. time: april 19th 2009, at 12 o���clock, noon. the weather was warm with no cloud and no wind at all. i was at a friends house in hundvaag ne of the town centre, drinking coffee. from my spot on the sofa in her living room, looking out of the windows at the clear blue sky i noted that the contrails left by high flying aircraft didn���t move and were left hanging there, crisscrossing the sky and slowly spreading. i figured that the contrails would eventually turn this sunny day to an overcast one as they seemed to bloat over time in the perfectly still air and did not go away.

this was the reason that i had my attention at the sky in the first place.

at this point i noticed a bright light moving fast towards us from the left. it looked just like the landing lights on an aircraft but without the aircraft. this soon separated into two light sources spaced close together and i could just make out that they were connected to a solid object. at this point i called out to my friend: what is that? what the heck is that?! and i got to my feet.

we both ran over to the windows to have a better look. at this point the object was rather close and it soon scooted in front of the windows and disappeared over the roof, out of sight and obviously moving so fast as there was no point in running through the house to have a final glimpse of it disappearing on the other side of the building. 

we were both very shaky after this and we started right away to try to find a rational explanation. as of yet we are at a loss. the object looked like nothing i have seen before. it didn���t have wings or a tail (no control surfaces whatsoever). the closest thing i can compare it with is it had the general shape of a hat with a very tiny brim on it. the two lights were on the upper half of it (or at the very top) and they shone with a bright white light (just as normal landing lights would). the colour of the object itself was dirty gray or black. i could not detect any further details as it was moving so fast. i noticed that the sun reflected off the top of it. i estimate the size to be about 8-10 feet at its base and about 6-8 feet tall.

it moved very steadily in a perfectly straight line with no wobble at all, in fact, it was almost as if it were moving on a pair of (invisible) rails. i estimate the speed at around that of the sound or slightly below (much like when fighter aircraft fly past the crowds in air shows, just under the speed of sound). there was no sound whatsoever (not even a swoosh), and the windows were open because it was a hot day. also i noticed that the leafs on a big tree in the garden did not move as the object streaked just a few feet above it. the windows should have rattled when an object of that size moved so close at such a speed and this fact puzzles me more than anything about this experience.

my friend saw it pass overhead, which i didn���t because of the angle in which it moved in relation to the windows and she said that it had a purple ���hazy��� colour on its ���back side���. 

i read the local newspaper thoroughly the next day but there was no mention of it. the course of the object was ne which would lead away from any built up areas.

this is the only experience of this kind any of us have had.
content.summary: Object close by at high speed in daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
On tue 07/28/09 ~ 22:17 a bright red orb similar in size to saturn first quickly moved from wsw (elv 50 deg) to ene (elv 140 deg) slowed, and then remained ene being obstructed by clouds or turning "on and off" until 22:27.  at times the orb's glowing red steady color seemed to brighten but did not strobe or flash at all while moving.  present during at least part of the viewing during a cloudy night were two adults and four children in front of our melvindale, mi house.  

spaceweather.Com indicated: viewing: melvindale, michig (42.3 lat., -83.2 long.)  all times displayed are local. you have no flybys. please check again next week!

i took some digital photos and will download later to my pc.
content.summary: A bright red orb the size of saturn moved from wsw (elv 50 deg) to ene (elv 140 deg) witnessed by four + people.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my trash container to the curb and looked up at the sky.  this is a routine thing for me, as i take a minute to gaze across and enjoy the night view, especially on cloudless or slightly cloudy evenings.  i looked up to the northeast and observed a bright, what i thought was, star.  as i looked at the star-like object it began to become more intense in brightness.  to the point where it really got my attention.  the intensity of the light became brighter than any other object in the sky, but the object itself remained the same size.  the object then began to dim, appeared as if it turned away from me and completely went black as the night sky.  i gazed in the same area for approx. 10 more minutes never seeing anything that matched the previous intensity.  also observed cloud movements to see if, by chance, clouds may have obscured the object, and i observed an airplane fly in the same area as the object and the airplane was clearly visible, however no object.  just prior to observing the object i got an emotion of clarity and awareness of other life forms (we are not alone feeling).  as the object became brighter in intensity i felt as though i could not look away, and closeness with the object as though i were not actually thousands of miles away from it.
content.summary: Star-like object became intense in light then dimmed and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am a professor at umkc and was leaving my office last night when i saw a circular or sphere shaped craft in a southwest direction right over my position at approximately 80 degrees.  it looked like it was flying very slowly and very low.  i've never seen anything like this and wished that there were other people around to see it with me, but there was no one in sight.  i didn't have a camera with me.  the craft looked dark but it had an orange glow around the entire thing - there were no other lights on it.  i tried to determine the source of the glowing light but it looked like it enveloped the entire craft.  there were no lights, wings, or tail and it did not look like an airplane or helicopter.  

the size was approximately the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length, so it was very large and very close.  i heard a very low pitched hum for a couple of minutes when i first spotted the object, then the hum stopped. the object moved very slowly from the southwest to northwest, then i lost sight of it behind trees.  i've never seen a plane or helicopter move that slow.  i watched it for some time - approximately 12 minutes total time. during this time i attempted to call my wife at home to see if she could see it, but my cell phone would not work, giving me a message of "out of service area," but after the craft was no longer visible i tried again and got through just fine. i thought that was very odd, but the entire scene was very odd.  i'd be interested in finding out if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Circular ufo with orange glow over umkc campus

content.detailedDescription:
My first "official" ufo sighting occurred at 1:43pm on 12-30-08 while watching a large jet at cruising altitude of 30-40k feet out the east window of our home.  i say "official", because i had never been inclined to report anything until my 2-16-9 sighting, though i had seen other strange lights over the years.  ironically, this object was seen over the same tree located two houses to the south where i would see another much closer object on 7-2-9.

as the jet was flying w to e at cruising altitude with full contrail, i perceived another silver-metallic looking object come out from behind some high clouds in the same area of the sky.  i have pictures of these clouds since i had asked my girlfriend to take some shots of the beautiful patterns about 20 minutes earlier.  for some odd reason, i felt drawn to this area of the sky and had been looking around with binoculars for a few minutes.  the ufo literally appeared to drop from behind the more solid looking clouds in 9092 and then make a right angle motion to the east.  unlike the jet, it had no contrail whatsoever, yet it was obviously in motion and appeared to be at about the same height.  i screamed downstairs for her to bring the camera upstairs as i was actually viewing a ufo!  she got off the phone, tripped up the stairs and got me the camera.  

the ufo then stayed motionless high above the tree in 9092 for approx 4-5 seconds, then simply vanished.  i attempted to take photos, but the distance was much too far for my camera to resolve.  i shot pics 9096 and 9097 at this time.  i did see the ufo through binoculars.  but it was still too far away to get a real solid idea of the shape.  the best i can state is oval/disc shaped with no fixed wings of any sort.  a much better sighting was to come........

please email me with any other questions: [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 12-30-2008 silver/metallic object quite high in se sky

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with grand kids.Saw this bright light over head it started geting closer to us then it stoped over our patio,i got my phone out started taking videos of the object it was 20ft away.Then 4 humen like people jumped off on to my patio,then thats when my grand kids started screaning because they saw them.I hurryed up got the grand kids into the house.I then went back out the oject moved over to the neightors house.I allso got videos of it.From jun of 08-09 i have 600 pictures,100 videos,20 pictures of ufo undergroud basses that our goverment build for them.     please help me dont no who to turn to.    they fly over every night about 15 of them till 530am.       help please.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying over san jose,calf. 10:00pm -5:30am

content.detailedDescription:
Arrived home from camping at 9:30pm just in time to see the shuttle/iss (docked together) at 9:34 i believe. watched it go by from w to sse (i believe). near the end of its visible path i started unloading camp gear from my pickup truck. my 8 year old son said "hey dad there is something flying by (or following...Dont recall exactly) the space station". i doubted his observation but looked about 15 seconds later and yep he was right. it wasn't following it when i seen it but it was headed almost due east (about two inches away at arms length when i fist saw it). perhaps they nearly intersected when he seen it so it looked to be right by it. 

i know airplanes well and consider myself an excellent spotter and i was saying at the time that it sure doesn't look like an aircraft. if it was it had to be at nearly 20-30k feet up and several miles south of us with its light on. actaully it was lit up like a  dim star then after a second or two would fade out slowly over a one or two second timespan then go all the way out, then fade back in. it consistently did this. it did not appear to be a typical nav light or comparable. i considered it maybe a satellite rotating on its own axis and reflecting the sun at each revolution maybe? after a minute of so it went behind some trees.

a minute or two later at maybe 9:37ish i happened to look up as i climbed my pickup bed to get more gear. somehow i noticed another moving star type object. i couldn't believe it. i called my son over and he too saw it. it was just like a dim star moving n to s. same iss speed and constant light not fading in/out like ojbect #1. watched it for about 2 minutes and it too went behind some trees.  again i doubted it was an aircraft and thought it really looked like a satellite.

my son and i have seen the iss and/or shuttle a good 20 times or more and watch it every chance we get. we have it down to the science half the time and can step out the door and see it immediately. we never seen another satellite that we know of so its odd to see maybe 2 the same time an iss sighting is going on. 

oh yes...One last thing which is very interesting. i overheard a guy at work saying his wife and kids saw a light trailing nearby the iss and then it moved off away from the iss. this tells me it was not an aircraft. they live about 60 miles nnw from me which would make an aircraft (if thats what it was) look way off to their se i would imagine while the iss would still appear in the same location. so object #1 was not an aircraft. ojbect #2 was not noticed by them.

perhaps this was (one or both) a satellite but i cannot find anything on the internet to go back a few days and see the path/times.

please please please let me know if there are others that saw this!

thank you
content.summary: Object #1 near iss headed due east. ojbect #2 2 min later headed south

content.detailedDescription:
7/21/2009, 10:40pm, happy valley, oregon. a cloudless night.  a clear view of a strange, fast-moving, round luminous, object. 

this was the second sighting for me in three days, both from my home, both of more than a minute long, and this one has two witnesses.  two nights earlier i had seen from my north-facing deck, at close range and nearly directly overhead, a silent, wingless, flamy yellow-white flying object.  i reported that to mufon and informed my wife who was not sure what to think of it - there were strange aspects which make that observation hard to relate to everyday experience.

my wife was in a room adjacent to our deck in the late evening of the 21st.   i was outside, as i often am when the sky is clear and it is not too cold, to look at the stars with my binoculars. i honestly was looking for another unidentified object as the portland area was lately an area with many odd sightings, including mine.  because of a possible psychic aspect of that earlier sighting, i thought i would try thinking on purpose that i wanted those same operators to fly by again - i wanted my wife could see the strange flying thing for herself.  so i concentrated on that for about a minute.  this is true.

in about 20 minutes a tiny bright light, slightly yellow, appeared in the southwest at about 30 degrees off the horizon, perhaps as much as two miles away.  as it approached in level flight, i estimated the height at about 2000ft. it had the brilliance of a single landing light of a commercial aircraft, seen straight on about a mile away.  i assumed it a plane heading for pdx.  with my binoculars i watched the light approach and in a few moments noted that i could not see any running lights, no wings, no stabilizers, no outline of a body, and that it was obviously round.

i went inside and brought my wife out to look; this took perhaps 15 seconds.  at this point it was about 45 degrees above the southeastern horizon, about mile away, and for 10 seconds or more she viewed the object, first at an angle and then nearly perpendicular as it began its pass directly to our south.   she handed the binoculars to me.  i watched it for about 10 seconds during which it passed directly perpendicular to my vision, handed the binoculars back and she watched for another 5 seconds before handing them back to me.  i had a clear last look with the binoculars for about 3 or 4 seconds.

i had the feeling that the object was in some sort of purposeful travel, as if its operators were attending to serious business.  both of us were left with an uneasy feeling about what we saw.

as it neared we both saw that it was a bright cold-white light in the shape of a globe, perfectly round.  it had a smooth surface with a soft incandescent "reading light bulb" quality to it.  the intensity was that of a car headlight at roughly 150ft, or a powerful hand lantern at half that distance.  anyone who happened to be looking would have seen this thing; it was down low, bright, cooking along pretty well, and exceedingly strange.

the size was that that of a green pea held at arm's length - or in other words the diameter of a pencil looked at straight on at arm's length. with this apparent size at the viewing range, i estimate the diameter of the light was roughly 15ft.

it flew west directly over the top mt. talbert, 3000 feet away to our south, and it was flying level at about 2000ft up. it was traveling somewhat faster than freeway speed, perhaps up to 75mph.  traffic on sunnyside road almost directly below it, travels at around 50mph and this object was going faster than that.  

as it passed directly perpendicular to me, through the binoculars i clearly saw, for about 5 seconds, a surrounding "globe" of something like light dust or fog.  as if the bright light was centered inside a perfect ball of very faint cold-white fog.  this "halo" was two or three diameters of the bright center object.  when the object and halo moved out of the general perpendicular angle, this halo was no longer apparent.  my wife did not see it from her viewing angles.  afterwards i checked my binoculars against other point light sources and did not see any such halos or light scattering. with the apparent size and viewing distance, and comparing the size of the halo against the distances between fir trees at the summit, i estimate the diameter of the halo was 30ft to 50ft.

right at the end of the sighting, with the binoculars i followed the object as it flew in level flight to the east.  at perhaps a half mile from mt talbert the object suddenly turned into an orange globe. and then probably 1 second later it instantly popped off leaving the image of an orange horizontal rectangular bar that itself faded out in perhaps 2 seconds - the bar did not appear to fall or rise, it just hung there and faded away.  no horizontal light was apparent in that area of the sky after that orange bar faded out. the horizontal length of the bar seemed to be the same as diameter of the globe.  the thickness was maybe one-third the length.  it was as if a huge suspended light filament inside a massive incandescent bulb had rapidly cooled off after the power had been cut. 

we saw no engines or motors, no rotors, no wings, no wheels, no struts or stabilizers, no flashing lights, no projections or dangling things of any type, no flames or exhaust, no evidence of any propulsion source; just an evenly-illuminated unchanging light.  we did not hear any sounds from its direction.  it did not vary in horizontal/sideways position during the entire sighting.   no snaking in the air, no wiggles, no drifting, no spinning, no bumping along, no surface-like reflections, no balloon-like undulation. 

this could well be my imagination, but at the instant this thing popped off and went into an orange bar, at that same instant i would swear that i felt a slight shock wave, sharp.  given the distance it makes no sense.  but there was an instantaneous feeling, sort of like with a fireworks launcher but without the sound, and the pressure wave at a higher frequency and going much faster.  in response i let out a "hoh" and not just because the sight was incredible. but then again, imagination is a powerful thing, so who knows.        

two things that might be noteworthy.  this object apparently flew nearly over two possibly sensitive sites, certainly at an observational altitude.  on the south side of mt. talbert is located camp wythicomb, an active guard base - the object would have been the same distance from the base at it was from us.  second, the light first appeared to me at a position over the general area of the precision castparts company.  the company is a prime employer here; they manufacture very high quality aerospace parts, they make and use advanced alloys, and boeing is understood to be a major client. boeing is the dod's major supplier of flying craft and related national security technology.

now, if this thing was nothing more than an rc flyer made up to look like a ufo, any of the makers reading this are laughing now; i was tricked good as were probably quite a few others who saw it but are too shame-avoidant to report what they know.  but if it was a hoax, it was too good to be true - big, very fast, highly controlled, bright as heck: lots of technology and expense in that.  my wife and i have no idea what that thing might have been.
content.summary: Bright white sphere inside spherical "dust cloud" - fast, level, low altitude, >2 minutes. blinked out into yellow bar. 2 wittnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south and came up to hwy 66 in platteville, i had noticed about a mile back something in the sky, it was 3 dots, that were quite large from my view, as i watched it was rotating very quickly while maintaining the shape of a triangle, i could not beleive what i was seeing, my brother was with me and he verified what i was seeing. i had my camera and took a picture  and un-belivably i caught it, and then it just dissappeared! it was like chrome discs in the sky. i still am in dis-belief but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Noticed a chrome object triangular rotating in a cylinder way.

content.detailedDescription:
My 2 year old son saw it first and pointed it out. he said "star daddy" as my back was toward it.It was pretty high in the eastern sky,almost directly above us. i thought it was too bright out to be a star, but i convinced myself it had to be a star. i am certainly not an expert on the heavens,what do i know,so a star it must be. i sat my son on my lap and we looked up at it and i did the "star light,star bright" rhyme with him and we made a wish. i kept glancing up at it and it just didn't seem right. so i went in and got binoculars. what i saw was a strange backward c shape, but i am still putting that off as a misfocus of the binoculars. at this point i was still going with the 1st star of the evening. it was unmistakably the brightest thing in that part of the sky and no other stars were visible. so i would glance up a few times while i was playing with my son. then the star grew dimmer, so i grabbed the binoculars and looked again. this time there were 3 more dimmer dots along with a still brighter star/dot that was now 50% dimmer than before. these 4 lighted points made an elongated diamond shape. i never saw where they came from or when they showed up. at this moment i am still trying to convincing myself that this was just a star pattern showing up as the sun was going down. but it was still so bright in the light blue early evening sky,and there were still no other stars to be found at that time. but i continued to rationalize it off as stars. i didn't want to jump to any conclusions. i had no reason to at this point, but now i was going to watch more intently. as i watched through binoculars, the dots/points began moving and formed into the four points of a square. once i saw the movement,i immediately put the binoculars down and called over my neighbor who was outside doing yard work. i wanted a witness! in a matter of that second of putting the binoculars down, and calling out to my neighbor,then raising the binoculars back up again, it was gone! the same point of light that was so bright that my 2 year old originally brought to my intention, 
was gone! the brightest point/s of light in the sky just completely vanished. no clouds in that part of the sky, just gone. what i saw, who knows, i'm not drawing any final conclusions, but it was amazing.
weird stuff!
content.summary: Bright star  in the early evening sky turned into a 4 point diamond shape, then a 4 point square and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
In 1978, sometime in mid august about 10 o'clock at night, 
three friends and i were just outside the city of red deer.  
we were standing in a farmers field, when we all noticed these lights flying right towards us.

i suppose i first thought it must be a plane, but that was impossible as i will explain.  
it looked like they were very close to us, like i could reach up and almost touch them, as they flew right over us.  

there was three points of green light, flying in a triangle shape but independent of each other, as i could see them so clearly go out of formation ever so slightly. 
behind these were two points of red light, flying back and forth in a larger pattern, like they were whipping back and forth.  

it was over fairly quickly but at the same time it was like i was seeing it in slow motion.
seeing these lights, flying over us was a little unnerving, but what seemed the hardest thing to comprehend was there was no sound what so ever.

they just continued on until they were out of sight, which seemed to take less time than seemed possible, if they were going as slow as it had appeared.

we all just stood there and everyone was speechless.
we said "what the heck was that" and with much trepidation, we all described what we had seen.
then none of us really said anything else. we went on with our evening without talking about it again.

i never told anyone at first.  a few years later i mentioned it to one of the people that witnessed it with me.  he just smiled and nodded, but did not want to talk about it.
content.summary: Myself and three other friends were standing in a field just outside of town,  we looked up and saw three green points of lights in a triangle shape yet independant of each other, behind these were two red lights whipping back and forth, crisscrossing.

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking and talking to a friend on the phone .Noticed a bright light above the tree line, walked off porch towards the field to get a better look , my first thought was that it was a hot air ballon but realized it was not.Had a bright orange light source that at first i thought was fire but it wasnt, it was more "star like" it would flare up every now and then and when it did it seemed to light up a translucent or opaque bubble over the top. this "bubble" or whatever..Did not seem to have a rigid or stable shape or structure...It was like a nebulus gas bag or some thing...Much lower than a plane slower than a plane...Really bright orange...Was about the size of a hot air ballon...Ive been in a ballon before this was not a ballon didnt seem like it was controlled. my gut instinct was that it was alive...Sounds silly but it was like a jelly fish or something.Watched for about 4 or 5 mins.  it blinked twice then it was just gone. there were planes in the area at the same time and about 10 mins. after it blinked out a helecopter flew the same path.Really freaky. went inside to get my video recorder  hung outside another 30 mins. or so, but nothing else, other than some shooting stars.Anyone else see this?
content.summary: Silent orange glob floating thing

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were swimming and we were actually talking about ufo's and i looked up and this very bright light (sphere) was traveling from a westerly to south easterly direction overhead.  there was no sound...My son thought it was a plane, but it was too low and there were no other lights on it other then the very bright light....We watched it travel slowly across the sky and as we watched it, it wobbled maybe once as it got smaller and then just winked out.  it was too low for anything that i would consider the typical excuses for ufo's.  it was just freaky because we were talking about ufo's.  i've never seen anything like this before.  just thought i would mention it.  

in the pool
we were talking about ufo's so we were looking up into the sky
i couldn't even begin to think of what it was, i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter
it flew low, slow, and a little bit wobbly
i was amazed because of the timing of the conversation, and it sort of freaked me out, then i was in awe because whatever it was, it was something i've never seen and i guess i was hopeful that it would do something really weird to prove it wasn't an usual aircraft
we never took our eyes off of it...We watched it until it dissappeared
content.summary: A very bright light...No multi lights like a plane, just bright white

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to st.Louis on u.S. 61 and some lights in sky got my attention. i was curious and perplexed at first but as i observed more it seemed there were two or three of them and they were interacting with each other and sometimes even lit up the ground like daylight. i became scared and pulled over to a friends to get off the road for a while. after an hour i returned to my car again the flashing lights,white, were in the sky but i continued my drive to desoto. i became lost twice, very unusual for me and frustrated me  a great deal. once i was turned around i drove upon a german shepard just sleeping in the road and i thought how strange as no one in the area owns one and to the right of my car i saw a huge ufo ,disc with one on top of the other ,blue and red lights and my car began to die. i panicked and tried to call 911 on my blackberry but it locked up completely and i could not reach anyone. i remember looking in the rear view and the dog just woke up and walked off the road. i  was 4 days later coming home and along the way on 61 again a huge light came upon my car very fast and i was followed by a disc with green and yellow lights for a few minutes and then it flew off.  truly terrified and car has had electrical trouble since. i do have some footage on my blackberry.
content.summary: Disc ,one on top of other, red, blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I got and odd feeling and was compelled to outside and take a look, which often happens and i see about six military planes along the northern mountain ranges i thought that was odd because the jets from the base only usually train in pairs. i then noticed a very large very bright orb traveling from the north west to the south east. the object seemed unstable traveling at such slow speeds and seemed to wobble as it traveled at about 150 to 200 mph judging on the base that i estimate it was at about 8000ft in the air and looked to be as big or bigger than the new raptor jets that were flying. as the object was overhead it was its brightest. after it was about 2 miles to the southeast another jet came loud and very fast from the west. the other planes seemded to be just trailing it not getting very close. as the latter plane approached the boject seemed to travel faster and them dissapeared into nothing. the light faded to black and the planes contimued on their route as if still following the object. is it weird to dream of things like this before they happen???
content.summary: Bright wobbling orb chased by 7 new semi silent raptor  jets in tucson

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on route 108 north in kensington, nh.  as i was approaching the local elementary school, toward the north, i could see a large light sort of hovering in the sky.  at first, i thought it could be the moon, but i very quickly realized that it was some sort of aircraft hanging in the sky.  one thing was clear: the light was too large to be a plane.  

i couldn���t keep my eyes off the light, as it was so bright it could be seen through patches of trees.  the light was round and had a yellowish tint to it.  i continued to track the light until i lost sight of it, almost as if it had left my horizon.  the experience lasted about a minute or so.

briefly after, i tried to call my father.  when i connected to his phone, i heard muffled background noise.  i listened as long as i could bear before i was too freaked out to continue.  i called my father again, and when i connected, he claimed that i had not gone through to his phone.  i���m not sure if there was some type of electrical interference, but i have never had any type of call quite like that.

my hometown, exeter, nh, is known for some of its encounters with ufo���s. the area supposedly has a high propensity due to its proximity with the pease air force base and the seabrook power plant.  all that i can say was that i saw some type of unnatural light it thoroughly freaked me out.
content.summary: White-yellowish light hanging in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Object was almost the intensity of venus, but reddish/orange. traveling southeast just a little faster than an airplane. then the object became just as bright ...If not brighter than venus, almost like a fireball,then the object started traveling upwards as the light rapidly dimmed away.
several minutes later (approx 10min),if happened again with an object traveling from direct west. going direct east, ending with the same result.
content.summary: 2 bright reddish lights appeared  near clearwater florida at 2 different times shoot out into space

content.detailedDescription:
A few notes....This is getting exceedingly crazier, but honest to god at the house in briargate, my stereo seriously was having this jumbled, fuzzed talking with voices that did not sound human. i had everyone in the house and my friends listen, and they all agreed they heard it..Even when the stereo was unplugged. this may have been a ghost, i don't know. but i do know that  there were two distinct voices both male. also, at one point i swear i heard one say my name.
the even weirder thing is that sometimes my friend and i would be laying down to sleep when we would hear these distinct "whooshing" sounds in our heads, like a car driving by lamp posts with the window open, and they would get faster and faster until our bodies were paralyzed even though we were awake. sometimes i would hear the carpet shuffling and hear those same voices from the stereo talking over my bed, again two distinct voices. it would always be the same night for both of us and around 3 to 4 am. we are both kind of psychic and attract ghosts. psychic isn't what people think it is, we have no conscious effort over it and most people who claim they are are liars.
after the incident in 1989 or 90, i thought i would mention i got seriously ill. my eyes were crusted so bad i couldn't open them and i was paralyzed and my voice went out. as soon as the sun came up, my body could move, i was able to open the crust from my eyes tearing my lashes out, and my voice came out. i had been screaming for help for like 3 hours. 
 i never had any weird crap happen until after i had a close call with an abscess that got infected making my head swell 4 times its size on the right side and the infection was going to spread to my brain. i was allergic to penicillin and no doctor would touch me they said i was a liability. anyways, after i survived i started having ghosts come to me and see ufos. i don't tell anyone accept my close friend, my husband and my best friend. i also have my husband and best friend document all of my experiences, like my premonitions so i have at least a witness.

Night before last, saturday night (07-25-2009), about 10:30 p.M. i was at the sink washing dishes, the tv had a few quick interruptions, didn���t lose contact, though. i went outside, and very low on the horizon, in the trees and just above and below the hills from my house was a flashing light. it was too low and too obscured by trees and hills to see, but it was a light of some sort at the same time my tv had brief interference. i could only barely see the light moving west for about 7 seconds - couldn���t see it well enough to say if it was a plane, etc. but no noise.
content.summary: Receding light, tv interrupted

content.detailedDescription: I was comeing back from fishing with a buddy.Siting in his passinger side he was talking about how a friend and him was heading back from eugene when they saw these lights where lights should not be.When i loked over and saw what he was talking about.I saw what loked like campfires but its to dry not allowed in the woods.The light just kind of flickerd like a campfire.It was wierd i looked over to the mountain and i see what he saw a few days earlyer that blew my mind.I said [cms/tg/pd] look at that omg pull over there are those lights look we almost stoped on the middle of the road.And they move with blink of an eye movement nap one hump to the other hump of the mountain just that fast.That was breath takeing,we looked at each other no way to to out run something that fast.
content.summary: More like a camp fire

content.detailedDescription: I was on the shore of long lake at the steinke resort fishing when i noticed a bright orange light come over the tree line.  it made no noise and gave the effect like it was on fire, very slow moving as well.  to me it seemed like a floating orange disco ball that traveled across the sky.  i watched it for approximately 3 minutes as it got smaller and smaller and disappeared on the other side of the horizon. at first i thought it was somekind of firework since it was so close to the fourth of july, but its trajectory was to straight, and it was moving too slow and also gaining altitude the further it got away.  i also thought helicopter but i was too close to it when it first appeared, and like i stated before it made no sound.  my reaction was one of fear and awe mixed. i wanted it to come back so i could witness it again, but i was also scared that whatever it was might have known i seen it so well.  i stayed glued to the sky the remainder of the night.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Orange glistening ball of light
